subdisciplines.name: Digital Media Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of digital media and their impact on society, culture, and communication.

subdisciplines.name: Film Studies
subdisciplines.description: The academic study of films as a form of art, entertainment, and communication.

subdisciplines.name: Journalism Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the production, distribution, and reception of news and other forms of media content.

subdisciplines.name: Media Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the psychological processes underlying media and communication, including media effects and audience behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Media Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of how media shape and are shaped by culture, society, politics, and economics.
